name: Brian Hoang
bio:
Brian is a sophomore majoring in Software Engineering and minoring in 
			  Entrepreneurship. He is a Research Assistant in the Human Language Technology 
			  Research Institute, and has held software engineering internships at IntelliEpi 
			  and Raytheon. He will be interning at Credera during summer '17. During his spare 
			  time, Brian can be found playing sports, rocking a piano, or watching horror movies 
			  with his eyes closed.
